channel.title: Dragon Bones, Increased xp...random?
channel.description:
alright..so I increased the xp of each dragon bone when u bury...is it random or something because once innawhile i get it...othertimes i only get 72 xp..
[code] case 536: //Dragon Bones prayer[2] = 10000; break;[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2007, 08:39:10 PM[/size][hr]any1?

item.title: Dragon Bones, Increased xp...random?
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

[code]		case 536: //Dragon Bones
			addSkillXP((XP*playerLevel[##]), ##);
			break;[/code]

replace xp with the amount u want it to give and replace ## with the skill #it is

Read full topic
